page.title: 03AMENITIES(1) DANE END & AREA
page.content: The{Post Office and general stores}is owned by Mr. and Mrs. Woods. It is open from 9am to 1pm and from 1.30 to 5.30pm on Monday, Tuesday. Thursday and Friday. On Wednesdays the shop closes at 1pm and on Saturdays at 4pm. The shop sells a great variety of goods including fresh, tinned and frozen foods, sweets, birthday cards, toys, household cleaning materials, tobacco and cigarettes and keeps a small stock of haberdashery. The{Post {Office}is part of the shop and is open at the same times. The{garage}was added to the{forge}in 1938 to expand the business. The Springate family took over the garage 28 years ago and have not made any changes to the garage, the petrol pumps having been added in 1938. The garage has between 30-40 customers per day. The petrol pumps are hand pumps.
